snippet: The statement by David Wildstein, which says that Mr. Christie illegally revealed grand jury information, offers the first insider confirmation of a tale of New Jersey political corruption.
abstract: Former Port Authority official David Wildstein gives sworn statement in civil case saying New Jersey Gov Chris Christie broke the law as he heavily controlled state politics; statement by Wildstein, who has admitted to setting up access-lane closings on George Washington Bridge, reinforces image of Christie's heavy hand as he often used Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, which runs the bridge, for his own political gain.
lead_paragraph: The statement by David Wildstein, which says that Mr. Christie illegally revealed grand jury information, offers the first insider confirmation of a tale of New Jersey political corruption.

headline.main: Ex-Official Says Chris Christie Broke Grand Jury Law
headline.print_headline: Ex-Official Says Christie Broke Grand Jury Law

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
